programme.title: Going Beyond
programme.desc: Going Beyond is wanderlust-filled hitchhiker Mariia Khandus’s new travel project. She’s journeyed around the world. Everybody knows that Thailand, Vietnam, and Indonesia are great places to relax with wonderful beaches and delicious fruits! But what do you know about the local people? The expats? About the real lives of those living in these exotic countries? In our trip, we will discover it all, together! We visit the non-touristy places and show you the real Indochina! This is a set of stories of different people, through the prism of whom we show life in a country. It is a collection of diverse achievements, experiences and emotions. We are looking for the most interesting stories for you to keep expanding your own consciousness. Unbelievable panoramic views, interesting people, exciting stories and adventures – you’ll see all of this in our travel show, Going Beyond!

programme.title: Gourmet Escapes
programme.desc: Chef Massimo Capra meets chef Sheldon Fonseca of a very exclusive resort high above the town of Vevey. Chef Sheldon sends Massimo on a gathering spree that takes him into local restaurants, vendors located along the spectacular Alp mountain trail from Chef Sheldon's restaurant. When Massimo has completed the gathering of ingredients, they prepare the dish and enjoy their creation above the clouds and overlooking a breath-taking view of Lake Geneva below.

programme.title: It’s How You Get There
programme.desc: Sam, Julian, and Jenn experience a variety of exciting modes of transportation as they journey across the country. They use things such as trucks, cars and motorcycles, and they also experiment with ATVs, boats, jet skis, and air travel. Each episode features their competition with each other, including wagers, witty banter and adrenaline to keep the viewers entertained. They are continuously learning as they try out these new modes to see which one they consider the best. This is "It's How You Get There".

programme.title: American Travelers
programme.desc: Dave & Kari give viewers a tour of all four Hawaiian islands.

programme.title: Hayman's Way
programme.desc: Follow David Hayman as he unearths the people and places that make Scotland unique.

programme.title: Raw Travel
programme.desc: So much more than the famous canal and modern skyline, Panama’s natural wonders shine for those willing to take the road less traveled. We explore beyond the obvious tourist sites and dig deep to uncover Panama City’s siren song that has enticed travelers for decades. The crew visits Bocas del Toro, the lovely Portobelo and then an unforgettable journey to visit the indigenous nation of the Kuna Yala at San Blas.

programme.title: Great Destinations Americas
programme.sub-title: Great Destinations Americas: Across The USA
programme.desc: Great Destinations of the World takes you to some of the most beautiful and exotic places on the planet. With unbelievable views and fascinating commentary, you will discover these exquisite destinations hold more history than you ever imagined. Travel to picturesque locations in America, Africa, Asia, and Europe. Learn the history of each place, delight in the local cuisine, listen to native music, and leave with feeling like you just experienced some of the most exciting places on the planet.

programme.title: American Travelers
programme.desc: Dave & Kari visit the Dominican Republic and explore the town of Samana, then go to Bacardi Island.

programme.title: Hayman's Way
programme.desc: Follow David Hayman as he unearths the people and places that make Scotland unique.

programme.title: Raw Travel
programme.desc: There is a lot to love about the laid back destination of Honduras. Raw Travel explores the little known Garifuna culture and some of Central America’s best beaches and coral reefs for one of the most incredible and economical scuba destinations around.

programme.title: The Colours of China
programme.desc: Five colours are an integral part of contemporary China and the ancient philosophy of Wu Xing. Each episode takes us to regions where we meet our characters, learn how Wu Xing sits in their lives and explore the landscapes they live in.
